title: PROGRAM 3: SLEEP OPTIMIZATION
subtitle: Weeks 1-4: Perfect Consistency
subtitleDescription: This phase achieves absolute consistency in sleep timing, including weekends and social events. You'll also establish an advanced 30-minute wind-down routine and begin tracking detailed sleep metrics.
videoDescription: Learn the fundamental movement patterns that build true functional strength: squat, hinge, push, pull, carry, and rotate. These movements translate directly to real-life activities and athletic performance.
description: This advanced program is for those who have good sleep duration but want to maximize sleep quality and consistency. Over 12 weeks, it fine-tunes all aspects of sleep hygiene, addresses subtle disruptors, and implements advanced strategies for deep and REM sleep optimization. The program uses sleep tracking data to make personalized adjustments and focuses on the 10-20% improvements that transform good sleep into excellent sleep.

sections.title: Why It's Beneficial
items: Peak Performance: Optimized sleep enhances athletic and cognitive performance
Longevity Benefits: Consistent, quality sleep is linked to healthier aging
Mood Stability: Excellent sleep provides emotional resilience
Recovery Maximization: Supports exercise adaptation and muscle growth
Disease Prevention: Optimal sleep reduces risk of all major chronic diseases
